content:
I'm trying something new, as part of the indieweb movement, I'm trying to have my 'social media' originate from my own site. I.e. own my own data.
I'm using fed.brid.gy to have these notes (likes and reposts) bridged to the Fediverse and Bluesky.

I still have my @gerben@todon.nl account and I won't cross-post directly to there (maybe boost my other account's posts), but I'll be experimenting with this new approach.

However, because of the federated nature of this, and the fact that my bridged account is 'not real' (long story), it'd be helpful if you could follow @gerben.dev@gerben.dev from other servers then todon.nl, so it appears in more local timelines.
